item.title: 69 'Sir Vidia Gets It Badly Wrong'
item.description: Source: http://www.outlookindia.com/full.asp?fodname=20040315&fname=Naipaul+%28F%29&sid=1 (downloaded Mar. 2004) The text of this article is also made available here because the OUTLOOK site, though free, requires a cumbersome sign-in process with which many users have trouble. OUTLOOK India, March 15, 2004 ‘Sir Vidia Gets It Badly Wrong’ William Dalrymple grants Naipaul his eminence, but challenges his jaundiced notions of Indian history WILLIAM DALRYMPLE There was some surprise when Sir Vidia and Lady Naipaul turned up at the BJP office last week and gave what many in the press took to be a pre-election endorsement not just of the party but the entire Sangh parivar programme.
